title: Ep 82: A Fashion & Beauty Talent Agent Shares His Secrets
itunes:title: Ep 82: A Fashion & Beauty Talent Agent Shares His Secrets

description:
It’s a masterclass with talent agent Daniel Weiner of Streeters, one of the biggest global management agencies in the fashion and beauty world. He is dropping GEMS for budding makeup artists and hair stylists. Before that, we break the next big Japanese beauty trend; review the Gigi Hadid X Maybelline New York collab; and talk Gen Z yellow. 

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
